title: CSecBridge Access Request
description: Schema for a single access request to a cloud provider.

client_request_id.description: The unique ID for the request from the client system (e.g., a ticket number).

target_cloud.description: The target cloud provider for the operation.

account_id.description: The cloud provider account ID, project ID, or subscription ID.

context.description: The details of the specific operation to be performed.

principal.description: The user or service principal requesting access.

role.description: The name of the role to be added or removed.

duration_minutes.description: The duration for which the access is granted, in minutes. Optional for 'remove' actions.
